title: What are the steps for the development of a product from scratch? - Quora
tags: Startup Product Management Advice and Strategy

response.answer_text: Create a list of things you want to get done to make your product successful. As Mithun mentioned - focus on MVPs that sell when breaking down those things into achievable short term targets.  Make the best use of your skills to create the above list - consider operational aspects, development aspects, hiring & building the team, adding 3rd party contractors for doing a part of your work that is not what your core company does, filing patents etc.  And then Prioritise!
